“(Although)[] not[] knowing[] (it,)[] I[] spoke[] thus[] (saying):[] `I[] know,’[] not[] seeing[] (it,[] I[] spoke,[] saying:)[] `I[] see.’[] I[] bluffed[] vainly[] (and)[] falsely,”[] except[] (when[] said)[] in[] overestimation,[] he[] also[] is[] disqualified,[] not[] in[] communion.[]
